treatment.reference: Bergey’s Manual vol 1. pg 278, Table A2.20 and generic description from pg 276.
treatment.description: Optimal growth temperature 23.4˚C. Grows between 1.7 and 29.5˚C. Optimum pH for growth 7.7. Growth occurs between 0.1-0.5 M NaCl. The mol% G+C is 39.6. Isolated from the anoxic hypolimnion of Ace Lake, Antarctica. Irregular cocci, 0.8-1.8 µm in diameter; occurring singly or in pairs. Stringly anaerobic. Trimethylamine, dimethylamine, methylamine, and methanol are substrates for growth and methanogenesis. Acetate, dimethylsulfide, formate, and H2/CO2 are not substrates for growth and methanogenesis.
